snippet: More than 150 synthetic drug makers and sellers have been arrested in a crackdown on designer drugs, the Drug Enforcement Administration said.
abstract: Drug Enforcement Administration reports that more than 150 synthetic drug makers and sellers have been arrested in a crackdown on designer drugs that began in January.
lead_paragraph: More than 150 synthetic drug makers and sellers have been arrested in a crackdown on designer drugs, the Drug Enforcement Administration said.

headline.main: Arrests in Nationwide Crackdown on Synthetic Drugs Linked to Mideast
headline.print_headline: Arrests in Nationwide Crackdown on Synthetic Drugs Linked to Mideast
